title: Statement by the Press Secretary on S. 307 and S.J.Res. 8 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
April 25, 2011

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on S. 307 and S.J.Res. 8





On Monday, April 25, 2011, the President signed into law:
	 
	S. 307, which designates a Federal building and United States courthouse as the W. Craig Broadwater Federal Building and Unites States Courthouse, and
	 
	S.J.Res. 8, which appoints Stephen M. Case as a citizen regent of the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution.
